Let's take some time to review affixes. Affixes are added to words to change their meaning. They can be prefixes or suffixes.
Item.speech: Let's take some time to review aahfixes. Aahfixes are added to words to change their meaning. They can be prefixes or suffixes.

Item.text: ComputerTutor, could you give examples of prefixes and suffixes? I don't know much about them.

Sure, prefixes are letters or words added to the beginning of words to change their meaning. For example, if we look at the word recharge, re, is the prefix changing the meaning of charge. Suffixes are letters or words added to the end of words to change their meaning. For example, if we look at the word government, ment, is changing the meaning of govern.

Rule.name: Start
Rule.description: Start the lesson. Load the intor page.

Rule.name: StartPageLoaded
Rule.description: Delivering opening packs with animations. Load intro2. Got to LoadStartPages.

Rule.name: StartPageLoaded2
Rule.description: Deliver opening packs with animations on intro2. Load diagnostie_1 page in OpeningH. Go to LoadPage rule.

Rule.name: LoadPage
Rule.description: Just pass to GetDifficulty rule.

Rule.name: GetDifficulty
Rule.description: Check the difficulty level and decide type of tutoring pack. Go to GetTutoringPack rules.

Rule.name: GetTutoringPackEasy
Rule.description: Get easy tutoring pack and go to has tutoringpack rule.

Rule.name: GetTutoringPackMedium
Rule.description: Get medium tutoring pack. Go to HasTutoringPack rule.

Rule.name: GetTutoringPackHard2
Rule.description: Get hard2 tutoring pack and go to has tutoring pack rule.

Rule.name: GetTutoringPackHard
Rule.description: Get hard tutoring pack and go to has tutoring pack rule.

Rule.name: Continue
Rule.description: Start tutoring is has tutoring pack. Go to GetItem rule.

Rule.name: Stop
Rule.description: Stop is no tutoring pack. Go to close.

Rule.name: HasItem
Rule.description: Show meida and decide question agent. The media implemented for ComputerTutor to ask main question. No main question was prepared for ComputerStudent1. Got to AskQ rule.

Rule.name: NoItem
Rule.description: This rule gets to nowhere. System will freeze if GetItem returns Stop. The system will work fine if GetItem funcion is called only once on each page. That is, the stop event is never triggered.

Rule.name: CristinaAskQJordanCorrectJordanFirst
Rule.description: ComputerTutor asks main question, ComputerStudent1 answer correctly, then asks user. JordanCorrect message goes to no where. That is the javascript function did not implement JordanCorrect. Go to UserAnswer2 rule.

Rule.name: CorrectFJCJordanFirst
Rule.description: ComputerStudent1 correct, user correct. PositiveFeedbacktoBoth. To GoBack rule.

Rule.name: IncorrectFJCJordanFirst
Rule.description: jordan correct, user incorrect. Feedback, correct answer. To GoBack rule.

Rule.name: CristinaAskQJordanIncorrectJordanFirst
Rule.description: ComputerTutor asks main question but ComputerStudent1 answers incorrectly. Javascript did not implement JordanIncorrect. Wait for user answer and go to UserAnswer1 rule.

Rule.name: CorrectFJI
Rule.description: ComputerStudent1 incorrect, user correct.Give feedback and correct answer. Go to GoBack.

Rule.name: IncorrectFJI
Rule.description: Both incorrect. Give feedback, answer correct and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: CristinaAskQUserFirst
Rule.description: ComputerTutor asks main question, wait for user and go to UserAnswer rule.

Rule.name: CorrectJCUserFirst
Rule.description: user correct and let jordan answer correct, JordanCorrect media not implemented. Give feedback and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: CorrectJIUserFirst
Rule.description: User correct and let jordan answer incorrect, give feedback and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: IncorrectJI
Rule.description: User incorrect, jordan incorrect, feedback, correct answer and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: IncorrectJC
Rule.description: User incorrect, jordancorrect, feedback correct answer and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: BlankPumpJC
Rule.description: Blank prompt, goto UserAnswer2 rule.

Rule.name: BlankPumpJI
Rule.description: Blank prompt, goto BlankPumpJI rule.

Rule.name: CorrectPumpFJI
Rule.description: ComputerStudent1 incorrect, user correct. To GoBack rule.

Rule.name: IncorrectPumpFJI
Rule.description: Both incorrect. To GoBack rule.

Rule.name: CorrectPumpJC
Rule.description: user correct and let jordan answer correct, JordanCorrect media not implemented. Give feedback and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: CorrectPumpJI
Rule.description: User correct and let jordan answer incorrect, give feedback and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: IncorrectPumpJI
Rule.description: User incorrect, jordan incorrect, feedback, correct answer and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: IncorrectPumpJC
Rule.description: User incorrect, jordancorrect, feedback correct answer and go to GoBack rule.

Rule.name: BlankAgain
Rule.description: Double blank.To GoBack rule.
